action.name: Multiattack
entries: This creature may make three attacks per round.

action.name: Rocket Rifle
entries: Ranged Weapon range 80/160 ft. Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, 1 target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) ballistic damage. This attack may not be used against adjacent targets.

action.name: Crusher
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. A {@condition grappled} target takes double damage from this attack.

action.name: Heavy Rocket
entries: Once per round, target a 5ft space, a creature in that space must make a dc 15 dexterity saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) ballistic damage, or half damage with a successful save. Creatures within 10 feet must save as well, taking half as much damage if they fail, or a quarter as much if they succeed.
